block.p: American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled RHP Jon Ratliff from Sacramento of the PCL. Optioned OF Eric Byrnes to Sacramento of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed RHP Tanyon Sturtze on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Tony Fiore from Durham of the International League.

American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled RHP Jon Ratliff from Sacramento of the PCL. Optioned OF Eric Byrnes to Sacramento of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed RHP Tanyon Sturtze on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Tony Fiore from Durham of the International League.

National League METS--Sent OF Juan LeBron to St. Lucie of the Florida State League. Sent RHP Juan Aracena to Binghamton of the Eastern League. CHICAGO CUBS--Placed OF Rondell White on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Roosevelt Brown from Iowa of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Signed OF Jason Stokes. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Signed SS Daniel Gonzalez.

National Football League GIANTS--Released WR Brian Alford, T Chris Bober, LB O.J. Childress, DE Jomo Cousins, T Rome Douglas, T Pita Elisara, DE Frank Ferrara, FB Michael Jones, S Tinker Keck, G Scott Kiernan, G Mark Nori, WR Kevin Prentiss, S Tawambi Settles, K Brian Schmitz, S Greg Williams and TE Adam Young. JETS--Released S Omar Stoutmire, WR Yatil Green, DE Anthony Cook, QB Jim Kubiak, C Keith Short, OL Mike Gisler, OL Dennis O'Sullivan, RB Vaughn Sanders, DE Jon Michals and T Jeff Pilon. ARIZONA CARDINALS--Released C Mike Devlin, S Paris Johnson, C Jason Starkey, CB Jordan Younger and WR Bryan Gilmore. Placed T Jon Clark, LB Melvin Bradley and DT Jerry Drake on injured reserve. ATLANTA FALCONS--Released PK Jake Arians, DT Adriano Belli, CB Michael Booker, S Omar Brown, WR Ronnie Harris, CB Anthony Midget, WR Mareno Philyaw, OT Jose Portilla and DE Sam Simmons. Placed LB Marcus Buckley, DE Emil Ekiyor, DE Pellom McDaniels and C Matt O'Neal on injured reserve. BALTIMORE RAVENS--Reached an injury settlement with RB Jay Graham. Released RB Robert Arnaud, RB Jason Brookins, RB Alan Richard, TE Ryan Collins, OL Damon Denson, OL Richard Mercier, DT Jarrett Loggins, CB Jermaine Smith and WR Germany Thompson. BUFFALO BILLS--Acquired DB-KR Chris Watson from Denver for an undisclosed draft pick. Released RB Lennox Gordon, QB Mike Cawley, WR Drew Haddad, FB Josh Roth, LB Dustin Cohen, WR Kevin Drake, TE Ivan Gustafson, G Corey Hulsey, DE Jarrett Procell, DB Reggie Durden, DB Nick Ferguson and DB Jay Hill. Assigned DT Bryce Fisher to the military reserve list. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Released T Dan Best, LB Haven Fields, LB Michael Hawkes, WR Kerry Hood, RB Morgan Kane, QB Matt Lytle, DT Chuck Wiley, DE Gillis Wilson, G Cheston Blackshear, WR Shawn Foreman, DB Bill Gustin, T Matt Hogg, LB Kevin Homer, DT Jon Kirksey and WR Luke Leverson. Reached injury settlements with WR Scottie Montgomerie, DL Rasheed Simmons and DL Harry Deligianis. Placed LB Lamont Green on the non-football injury list. Terminated the contract of RB Anthony Johnson and G Clay Shiver. CHICAGO BEARS--Released TE Ryan Wetnight, PK Jaret Holmes, DB Terry Cousin, DT Russell Davis, RB Frank Murphy, QB Mark Hartsell, DT Ken Anderson, LB Shawn Banks, WR Corey Bridges, LB Keith Burns, S Donnie Caldwell, FB Scott Dragos, CB Ray McElroy, T Dan Palmer, CB Cordell Taylor, DE Chris Ward and DE Ben Williams. Placed WR Sulecio Sanford on injured reserve. Traded T Chad Overhauser to Seattle for an undisclosed draft pick. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Released G Brian DeMarco, RB Sedrick Shaw, CB Sirr Parker, CB Brian Gray, DT Andre Purvis, DT Chad Pegues, WR Marvin Chalmers, WR LaVell Boyd, G Roger Roesler and S JoJuan Armour. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Placed T Orlando Brown on the physically-unable-to-perform list. Released TE Kyle Allamon, TE Randy Palmer, LB Jeff Kerr, LB Jason Kyle, LB Tony McCombs, LB Ryan Taylor, DL Bill Duff, DL Jeff Dyra, WR Damon Dunn, WR Ronnie Powell, CB Corey Ivy, DB Tony Maranto, RB Rashon Spikes and P John Ballantyne. Placed RB Madre Hill, LB Kendall Ogle and OL Noel LaMontagne and DB Tim McKyer on injured reserve. DALLAS COWBOYS--Acquired TE O.J. Santiago from Atlanta for a fourth-round pick in 2001 and seventh-round pick in 2002. Released TE Tyji Armstrong, LB Corey Atkins, TE Rickey Brady, S Adam Edwards, DE Aaron Fields, CB Stephen Fisher, TE Chris Fontenot, RB Troy Hambrick, WR Damon Hodge, OL George Hudson, OL Tony Hutson, OL Michael Lies, FB Ryan Neufeld, DL Otis Pitts, QB Charlie Puleri, DL Brian Shaw, QB Clint Stoerner and CB Hurley Tarver. DENVER BRONCOS--Released LB Jamie Baisley, G Chris Banks, P Frank Biancamano, DB Deauntae Brown, G David Diaz-Infante, DE Antonio Edwards, DT Larry Fitzpatrick, LB Chris Gizzi, DB Jason Moore, G Glenn Rountree, DB Brad Trout, T Melvin Tuten and WR Bashir Yamani. Traded CB Chris Watson to Buffalo for an undisclosed draft pick. DETROIT LIONS--Released DT Alfonso Boone, TE Pete Chryplewicz, CB Chris Cummings, S Leomont Evans, WR Larry Foster, CB Todd Franz, WR Alonzo Johnson, TE Tony Johnson, LB Richard Jordan, T Tony Ramirez, FB Travis Reece, WR Andre' Rone, T Juan Roque, S Ty Talton, DT Henry Taylor and T Andy Vincent. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Acquired DT Chuck Osborne from Oakland for an undisclosed draft pick. Released OL Joe Andruzzi, OL Craig Heimburger, DT Jermaine Smith, TE Kaseem Sinceno, LB Jim Nelson, C Mike Newell, CB Jason Suttle, DE Kabeer Gbaja-Biamila, DT Ron Moore, LB Eugene McCaslin, CB Tyrone Bell, WR Bobby Brown, WR Junior Lord, QB Marcus Crandell, CB Tony Francis, TE Adam Newman, DE Tim Beauchamp and RB Rafael Cooper. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Released LB Chester Burnett, OL Anthony Cesario, OL Steve Ingram, S Blaine McElmurry, TE Rod Monroe, DE David Richie, LB Erik Storz, LB Corey Terry, DE Rahmaan Streater and WR Emanuel Smith. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Placed DT Damian Gregory on injured reserve. Released G Ben Adams, WR Robert Baker, T Keno Hills, TE Frank Leatherwood, C Grey Ruegamer, WR Damon Savage, T Mike Sheldon, S Chris Bayne, DE Rameel Connor, RB Brian Edwards, LB Tommy Hendricks, T Willie Jones, DE Tim Martin, G O'Lester Pope, LB Kyle Shipley and WR Corey Thomas. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Released RB Raymont Harris, NT Maurice Anderson, FS Chris Carter, TE Chris Eitzmann, G Rob Gatrell, NT Garrett Johnson, LB Olrick Johnson, CB Kelly Malveaux, DE Jeff Marriott, LB Marc Megna, WR Sean Morey, RB Patrick Pass and LB Maugaula Tuitele. Placed T Adrian Klemm on physically unable to perform list. Placed OL Lance Scott on injured reserve. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Released QB Billy Joe Tolliver, FB Michael Blair, FB Aaron Craver, DE D.J. Cooper, DE Bobby Setzer, RB Wilmont Perry, CB Shannon Garrett, G Robert Hunt, S Eric Johnson, C Jason McEndoo, C Tom Schau, LB Joe Tuipala, LB Philip Ward, LB Ron Merkerson, WR L.C. Stevens, T Chase Raynock and TE Dave Stachelski. OAKLAND RAIDERS--Released P Leo Araguz, K Joe Nedney, WR Kenny Shedd, WR Marcus Knight, WR Rodney Williams, S Je'Rod Cherry, TE Derrick Walker, LB Sam Sword and RB Jerald Moore. Traded OL Gennaro DiNapoli to Tennessee for an undisclosed draft pick. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Terminated the contracts of OL Eugene Chung, DE Mike Frederick, OL Lonnie Palelei and QB Doug Pederson. Released OL Jon Blackman, QB Travis Brown, DB Eric Edwards, DE Kendrick Gholston, RB Thomas Hamner, LB Antony Jordan, WR Anthony Ladd, FB Jamie Reader, T Oliver Ross, WR Elijah Thurman, LB-DE Al Wallace and WR Gerald Williams. ST. LOUIS RAMS--Released CB Clifton Crosby, WR Darrius Blevins, WR Curtis Jackson, TE Derek Lewis and DT Gaylon Hyder. Placed WR Darrius Blevins on Released-injured list. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Released OL Rick Austin, DE Jonathan Brown, DE Jason Chorak, TE Wendell Davis, K Jose Cortez, DE Cedric Harden, CB Dwight Henry, OL Joe Patton, DT Mac Tuiaea and S Eric Vance. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Released TE Shonn Bell, DT William Carr, WR Dwight Carter, LB Jim Emanuel, WR Chafie Fields, T Dan Goodspeed, S Ronnie Heard, DB Kelly Herndon, S Marcus Hill, DB Fred White and FB Joshua White. Placed LB Joe Wesley on Released-injured list, G Tyrone Hopson on Released-non-football injury list, TE Terrence Dupree on injured reserve and DT Jason Tenner on reserve-left squad list. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed T Chris McIntosh, to a multiyear contract. Released G Greg Bloedorn, T Daniel Collins, CB Joey Eloms, DT T.J. Frier, FB Anthony Green, S Warner Herndon, DT Ed Kehl, LB Jeff Kopp, TE Deems May, P Brian Moorman, WR Isaiah Mustafa, FB Scot Osborne, K Todd Peterson, WR Reginald Swinton and T T.J. Washington. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Released T John Blick, DT Carl Bradley, DE Chartric Darby, TE Jason Freeman, LB Bobbie Howard, WR Daniel Jones, TE Henry Lusk, CB Deshone Mallard, CB Earthwind Moreland, WR Yo Murphy, WR Drew O'Connor, S Jeff Popovich, RB Ketric Sanford and TE James Whalen. Placed T Kendall Mack on waived-injured list, FB Kevin McLeod on reserve-non-football illness, T Jason Odom on injured reserve and LB Shawn Stuckey on reserve-non-football injury. Reached an injury settlement with S Shevin Smith. TENNESSEE TITANS--Released QB Kevin Daft, OL Wes Shivers, FB Garett Gould, TE Mike Leach, TE Jason Gavadza, C Craig Page, DT Rod Walker, DT Henry Slay, LB Phil Glover, CB Wade Davis and DB Jerard White. Reached injury settlements with WR Gerald Harris, WR Mike Scarborough and RB Juan Johnson. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Released P Rodney Williams, WR Derrius Thompson, Tim Denton, DT Barron Tanner, WR Corey Allen, T Cornell Green, G Juan Porter, DT Del Cowsette, DT Jerry DeLoach, FB Bryan Johnson, G Ryan Kalich, QB Leon Murray and WR Marcus Stiggers.
